name: lightbend-enterprise-suite
description: Lightbend Enterprise Suite (ConductR) is a service orchestration platform to manage distributed systems.
preInstallNotes: We recommend a minimum of 3 nodes, each with at least 1 CPU share and 1GB of RAM available for the ConductR DC/OS Service.
postInstallNotes:
ConductR DC/OS service has been successfully installed!
To integrate ConductR into the DC/OS CLI follow these instructions: http://conductr.lightbend.com/docs/2.1.x/CLI
General documentation is available on https://conductr.lightbend.com/docs
postUninstallNotes: ConductR DC/OS service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
